nodes.text: The Dark Jedi Hideout was a Dark Jedi enclave on Yavin 4 in operation during the time of the Galactic Civil War. Located in the Swamp of Fallen Stars, the hideout was home to a number of Dark Jedi, the leader of which was known as Magus Jocle. Sometime following the Battle of Yavin in 0 BBY, Darth Vader tasked a loyal Imperial agent with killing Jocle, after it was revealed that Luke Skywalker was the Force user responsible for destroying the Death Star.
The Dark Jedi Hideout was a location in the 2003 massively multiplayer online role-playing game Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided, prior to the game's closure on December 15, 2011.
